arts.ttl: 'I am NOT a blue anymore': Jose Mourinho fires brutally honest warning to Chelsea fans ahead of his emotional Stamford Bridge return with Benfica
arts.sum: While Mourinho spoke lovingly of his two trophy-laden spells with the Blues, he said that affection will be suspended for 90 minutes when he is in the Benfica dugout.

arts.ttl: Jose Mourinho sends bold message to Chelsea and Enzo Maresca ahead of Benfica clash
arts.sum: Jose Mourinho has returned to Stamford Bridge ahead of Benfica's meeting with Chelsea in the Champions League on Tuesday night and reckons he is still the club's best ever manager

arts.ttl: Jose Mourinho says he will ‘always be a blue’ ahead of return to Chelsea with Benfica
arts.sum: The Portuguese, sacked twice by Chelsea, remains the club’s most successful manager and retains a fondness for his former side

arts.ttl: Chelsea Predicted Lineup vs. Benfica: Garnacho Steps Out of the Shadows
arts.sum: Enzo Maresca is dealing with a mountain of injuries heading into Tuesday’s Champions League clash.

arts.ttl: Jose Mourinho sends Chelsea message ahead of Champions League reunion - 'lost direction'
arts.sum: Former Chelsea boss Jose Mourinho will return to Stamford Bridge as a manager for the first time since he was at Tottenham as his current club Benfica faces the Blues in the Champions League

arts.ttl: Champions League Matchday 2 Predictions: Thriller in store at the Metropolitano
arts.sum: James Mason has picked out a score prediction for all 18 matches taking place on Matchday 2 of the Champions League.

arts.ttl: How to watch Chelsea vs Benfica: TV channel, live stream, kick-off time in Champions League
arts.sum: Chelsea are back in Champions League action as they welcome Benfica - now managed by Blues legend Jose Mourinho - to Stamford Bridge for a potentially-spiky encounter

arts.ttl: Maresca reveals three new Chelsea injury doubts ahead of Benfica Champions League game
arts.sum: Chelsea head coach Enzo Maresca reveals three new injury doubts ahead of Tuesday's Champions League fixture against Benfica.

arts.ttl: Chelsea to assess Caicedo, Joao Pedro and Andrey Santos before Benfica tie
arts.sum: Maresca reveals Caicedo, Joao Pedro and Andrey Santos will have late fitness checks at Cobham, citing “small problems”. He analyses Mourinho’s Benfica as unpredictable in set-up and tactics.

arts.ttl: Chelsea vs Benfica Prediction: Will José Mourinho Return to Haunt Blues?
arts.sum: Chelsea are made favourites by the Opta supercomputer when they host Benfica in the UEFA Champions League on Tuesday. Look ahead to the game at Stamford Bridge with our Chelsea vs Benfica prediction and preview.
